name: kinto-http
description: JavaScript HTTP client for the Kinto API.

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && rm -f dist/*.* && npm run dist-dev && npm run dist-prod && npm run dist-noshim && npm run dist-fx
scripts.dist-noshim: browserify -s KintoClient -g uglifyify --ignore babel-polyfill -e src/index.js -o dist/kinto-http.noshim.js -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ]
scripts.dist-prod: browserify -s KintoClient -g uglifyify -e src/index.js -o dist/kinto-http.min.js -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ]
scripts.dist-fx:
BABEL_ENV=firefox browserify -s KintoHttpClient --ignore events --bare -e fx-src/index.js -o temp.jsm -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ] && mkdir -p dist && cp fx-src/jsm_prefix.js dist/moz-kinto-http-client.js && echo "
/*
 * Version $npm_package_version - $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
 */
" >> dist/moz-kinto-http-client.js && cat temp.jsm >> dist/moz-kinto-http-client.js && rm temp.jsm
scripts.publish-to-npm: npm run build && npm run dist && npm publish
scripts.test-cover-html: babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --report html $npm_package_config_ISTANBUL_OPTS node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require ./test/setup-jsdom.js 'test/**/*_test.js' && open coverage/index.html

author: Mozilla <storage-team@mozilla.com>
